content: {"name": "CITY RELIEF/GOOD SHEPHERD MISSION ", "alternate_name": "", "description": "This location has: Socks, soup, bread, hygiene kits, prayer, & Life Care Visits (ie: one-on-one referrals to resources.)\nWe close for some holidays like 4th of July, we are closed the week of thanksgiving and from Christmas Eve through New Year\u2019s Day. We also close the 2 weeks prior to Labor Day.", "email": "", "url": "https://www.cityrelief.org/our-locations", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "336 Broadway", "address_2": null, "city": "Paterson", "state_province": "NJ", "postal_code": "07501", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.9182653, "longitude": -74.1603745}, "phones": [{"number": "(908) 352-8778", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Saturday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "No requirements"}]}
